extendedInfo.description: Strange Facts is a rather comprehensive collection of the weird, meaningful and interesting facts all over the world. You can Browse and enjoy the strange facts with clear and beautiful interface, you also manage the facts you like into favorite, if you like, you can Share the facts to your friend through Email, Gmail or SMS

reviews.title: Could use some work..
reviews.comment: Some of these facts are actually false, and it would be nice to be able to \"jump to fact no \'x\'\". Other than that - great app!
reviews.author: A Google User
